sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SVN_DIRECTORY_STATISTIC_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS VALUE FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SVN_DIRECTORY_STATISTIC ( ID ,REVISION ,REVISION_DATE ,LAST_CHANGED_REVISION ,AUTHOR ,RELATIVE_PATH ,PARENT_DIRECTORY ) VALUES ( #id# ,#revision# ,#revisionDate# ,#lastChangedRevision# ,#author# ,#relativePath# ,#parentDirectory# )
